name: Lama'D'Venture (LLama S.T.I)
description:
This is our first game and it was our first GameJam experience. (the theme was "animals")

_________

The rules are simple : 

you have to spit on the villagers and then bring them into the fense for some points, don't get caught!
You must have the most points at the end of the timer
The berries give you a temporary speed bonus

Making this game was a lot of fun, even if it is not really impressive ^^

Have fun!

_________

Credit : 

Programmers : Bramma (Mathieu), El Phasmo (Jules)

Graphic designer : Hurzo (Enzo)

Sound designer and composer : Jean-Baptiste (JB)

Useless guy but he saved the project at the very end when everything was destroyed by unity collab, also the guy behind the spit noise : Clemsprod (Clement)
